title: Dental caries in South Africa
creator_credit: South Africa. Dept. of Education. Film Services Union
brief_description: The film depicts the incidence of the disease in various parts of South Africa, and deals with the following aspects: effects of fluoride; mottling and hypoplasia, contributory causes of decay; preventive measures; correct methods of brushing the teeth; correct diet; regular dental examination.
